text:
And Saul agreed completely with killing him.

Now on that day a great persecution began against the church in Jerusalem, and all except the apostles were forced to scatter throughout the regions of Judea and Samaria.

Some<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2126" class="">devout</st> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> <st data-num="4792" class="">buried</st> <st data-num="4736" class="">Stephen</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">made</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">loud</st> <st data-num="2870" class="">lamentation</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">over</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="3" />
But Saul was trying to destroy the church; entering one house after another, he dragged off both men and women and put them in prison.
Now those who had been forced to scatter went around proclaiming the good news of the word.

<st data-num="5376" class="">Philip</st> <st data-num="2718">went down</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the main <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> of <st data-num="4540" class="">Samaria</st><n id="1" /> and began <st data-num="2784" class="">proclaiming</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

The <st data-num="3793" class="">crowds</st> were <st data-num="4337">paying attention</st> <st data-num="3661">with one mind</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">to</st> what <st data-num="5376" class="">Philip</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>,<n id="1" /> as <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="991" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="4592">miraculous signs</st><n id="2" /> he was <st data-num="4160" class="">performing</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="169" class="">unclean</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirits</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="994" class="">crying</st> with <st data-num="3173" class="">loud</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">shrieks</st>, were <st data-num="1831">coming out</st> of <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> who were <st data-num="2192" class="">possessed</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="3886" class="">paralyzed</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5560">lame people</st> were <st data-num="2323" class="">healed</st>.
So there was great joy in that city.
Now in that city was a man named Simon, who had been practicing magic and amazing the people of Samaria, claiming to be someone great.

<st data-num="3956" class="">All</st> the people,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3398" class="">least</st> <st data-num="2193">to</st> the <st data-num="3173" class="">greatest</st>, <st data-num="4337">paid close attention</st> to him, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="3778">This man</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> that is <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> ‘<st data-num="3173">Great</st>.’”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> they <st data-num="4337">paid close attention</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">because</st> he had <st data-num="1839" class="">amazed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> for a <st data-num="2425" class="">long</st> <st data-num="5550" class="">time</st> with his <st data-num="3095" class="">magic</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> they <st data-num="4100" class="">believed</st> <st data-num="5376" class="">Philip</st> as he was <st data-num="2097">proclaiming the good news</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316">God</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>,<n id="2" /> they began to be <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="5037" class="">both</st> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">women</st>.
Even Simon himself believed, and after he was baptized, he stayed close to Philip constantly, and when he saw the signs and great miracles that were occurring, he was amazed.
Now when the apostles in Jerusalem heard that Samaria had accepted the word of God, they sent Peter and John to them.

<st data-num="3748" class="">These</st> two<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2597">went down</st> and <st data-num="4336" class="">prayed</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">for</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3704">so that</st> they would <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>.

(<st data-num="1063">For</st> the Spirit<n id="1" /> had <st data-num="3764">not yet</st> <st data-num="1968">come upon</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3762">any</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> they had <st data-num="3440" class="">only</st> <st data-num="5225" class="">been</st> <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424">Jesus</st>.)<n id="3" />
Then Peter and John placed their hands on the Samaritans, and they received the Holy Spirit.
Now Simon, when he saw that the Spirit was given through the laying on of the apostles’ hands, offered them money,

<st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="1325" class="">Give</st> <st data-num="2504" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">power</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2504" class="">too</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">everyone</st> I <st data-num="2007" class="">place</st> my <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> on may <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “May <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="694" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="684" class="">perish</st> <st data-num="4862">with</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> you <st data-num="3543" class="">thought</st> you could <st data-num="2932" class="">acquire</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="1431" class="">gift</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5536" class="">money</st>!

You have <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="3310" class="">share</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2819" class="">part</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">matter</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2117" class="">right</st> <st data-num="1725" class="">before</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>!

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> <st data-num="3340" class="">repent</st> <st data-num="575">of</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2549" class="">wickedness</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">yours</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1189" class="">pray</st> to the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st><n id="1" /> that he may <st data-num="1487 686">perhaps</st> <st data-num="863" class="">forgive</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> for the <st data-num="1963" class="">intent</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I <st data-num="3708" class="">see</st> that <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="5521" class="">bitterly</st> <st data-num="4088" class="">envious</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> in <st data-num="4886" class="">bondage</st> to <st data-num="93" class="">sin</st>.”
But Simon replied, “You pray to the Lord for me so that nothing of what you have said may happen to me.”
So after Peter and John had solemnly testified and spoken the word of the Lord, they started back to Jerusalem, proclaiming the good news to many Samaritan villages as they went.
Then an angel of the Lord said to Philip, “Get up and go south on the road that goes down from Jerusalem to Gaza.” (This is a desert road.)

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="450">got up</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="4198" class="">went</st>. <st data-num="2400">There</st><n id="3" /> he met<n id="4" /> an <st data-num="128" class="">Ethiopian</st> <st data-num="2135" class="">eunuch</st>,<n id="5" /> a <st data-num="1413">court official</st> of <st data-num="2582" class="">Candace</st>,<n id="6" /> <st data-num="938" class="">queen</st> of the <st data-num="128" class="">Ethiopians</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1909">in charge of</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="1047" class="">treasury</st>. <st data-num="3739" class="">He</st><n id="7" /> had <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1519">to</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st> to <st data-num="4352" class="">worship</st>,<n id="8" />

<st data-num="5037">and</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="5290">returning</st> home, <st data-num="2521" class="">sitting</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="716" class="">chariot</st>, <st data-num="314" class="">reading</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st> <st data-num="2268" class="">Isaiah</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="5376" class="">Philip</st>, “<st data-num="4334">Go over</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2853" class="">join</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="716" class="">chariot</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> <st data-num="5376" class="">Philip</st> <st data-num="4370">ran up<n id="1" /> to</st> it<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">man</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="314" class="">reading</st> the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st> <st data-num="2268" class="">Isaiah</st>. He<n id="4" /> <st data-num="3004">asked</st> him,<n id="5" /> “Do you <st data-num="1097" class="">understand</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> you’re <st data-num="314" class="">reading</st>?”

The man<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">replied</st>, “<st data-num="4459">How</st> in the world <st data-num="1410">can</st> I,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1437 3361">unless</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="3594" class="">guides</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>?” <st data-num="5037" class="">So</st> he <st data-num="3870" class="">invited</st> <st data-num="5376" class="">Philip</st> to <st data-num="305">come up</st> and <st data-num="2523" class="">sit</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

Now the passage of scripture the man was reading was this:

“He was led like a sheep to slaughter,

and like a lamb before its shearer is silent,

so he did not open his mouth.

In humiliation justice was taken from him.

Who can describe his posterity?

For his life was taken away from the earth.”
Then the eunuch said to Philip, “Please tell me, who is the prophet saying this about—himself or someone else?”

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> <st data-num="5376" class="">Philip</st> started <st data-num="455 4750">speaking</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="757">beginning</st> <st data-num="575" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1124" class="">scripture</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2097">proclaimed the good news</st> about <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="1161">Now</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> they were <st data-num="4198" class="">going</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">along</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">road</st>, they <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2135" class="">eunuch</st> <st data-num="5346" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="2400">Look</st>, there is <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st>! <st data-num="5101" class="">What</st> is to <st data-num="2967" class="">stop</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st><n id="1" /> from being <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st>?”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> he <st data-num="2753" class="">ordered</st> the <st data-num="716" class="">chariot</st> to <st data-num="2476" class="">stop</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="297">both</st> <st data-num="5376" class="">Philip</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2135" class="">eunuch</st> <st data-num="2597">went down</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> Philip <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> they <st data-num="305">came up</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">out of</st> the <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st>, the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="726" class="">snatched</st> <st data-num="5376" class="">Philip</st> <st data-num="726" class="">away</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2135" class="">eunuch</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3765">any more</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">but</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4198">went on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3598" class="">way</st> <st data-num="5463" class="">rejoicing</st>.<n id="2" />
Philip, however, found himself at Azotus, and as he passed through the area, he proclaimed the good news to all the towns until he came to Caesarea.
